paragraph.content:
Since 2016 when I had my first PC, I fall in love with the Web, no need for "downloads" and installations, you just access the <1>URL</1> of your target web app and that's it. This basic thing long ago, start the ball rolling.

In the middle of 2021, I started my career as a developer, but it only has been possible, because, in 2018, one friend of mine show me a Youtube channel teaching programming, I saw there my opportunity to build my own web apps, and since that, I seek to get better. Nowadays I'm willing to use my knowledge to help others who want to be on the world wide web!

Currently, I'm <1></1> years old!
